tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE news_headlines (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    headline TEXT,
    published_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE sentiment_scores (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    headline_id INT,
    score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE trading_networks (
    network_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    network_name TEXT,
    strategy TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE trading_decisions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    network_id INT,
    decision VARCHAR(10),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
